original_text: But his followers took him by night and lowered him in a basket through an opening in the wall.
korean_text: 그의 제자들이 밤에 사울을 광주리에 담아 성벽에서 달아 내리니라

sentences.original_text: But his followers took him by night
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 추종자들이 밤에 그를 데려가서

sentences.original_text: and lowered him in a basket
through an opening in the wall
